info.title: Microsoft.PortalServices
info.description: Allows creation and deletion of Azure portal extensions.

post.description: compiles a file using inline content.

parameters.name: portalTenantCompileFile
parameters.description: The parameters required to compile a file.

get.description: List the operations for the provider
Gets all the portal extensions within a subscription.

parameters.name: portalExtensionName
parameters.description: The name of the portal extension.

values.name: Write
values.description: The kind of alteration is write

values.name: Delete
values.description: The kind of alteration is delete

stageDefinition.description: Defines the deployment stages, regions to deploy to for each stage and sequence to rollout to individual stages.

values.name: Version
values.description: The deployment source is from extension version.

values.name: CopySlot
values.description: The deployment source is from copying extension slot.

ExportKind.description: The kind of the source package.

values.name: SourceCodeZipUri
values.description: The export source is from zip uri.

values.name: BuildArtifactZipUri
values.description: The export source is from build artifact zip uri.

ExtensionApiDefinition.description: The ARM API definition used to generate extension content.

uri.description: The uri of the ARM API swagger.

apiVersion.description: The api version of the ARM APIs.

properties.description: The resource-specific properties for this resource.

ExtensionDeploymentListResult.description: The response of a ExtensionDeployment list operation.

value.description: The ExtensionDeployment items on this page

nextLink.description: The link to the next page of items

waitDuration.description: Default PT24H. The wait duration after each stage of the deployment. If a only single stage is being deployed waitDuration is ignored.

source.description: The build output artifact zip to deploy.

provisioningState.description: Readonly. The current registration or provisioning state which only appears in the response

nextStage.description: Readonly. The next stage of deployment from the deployment sequence e.g stage2

stage.description: Optional. The name of a a single stage to deploy. If omitted the Extensions stageDefinition is used for deployment.

ExtensionDeploymentPropertiesSource.description: The build output artifact zip to deploy.

kind.description: The kind of source content for deployment

values.name: Version
values.description: The deployment source is from extension version.

values.name: CopySlot
values.description: The deployment source is from copying extension slot.

value.description: The instance id of the source kind.

properties.description: The resource-specific properties for this resource.

ExtensionSlotListResult.description: The response of a ExtensionSlot list operation.

value.description: The ExtensionSlot items on this page

nextLink.description: The link to the next page of items

source.description: The source content for deployment to the slot.

provisioningState.description: Readonly. The current registration or provisioning state which only appears in the response

nextStage.description: Readonly. The slot that will be deployed to.

ExtensionSlotPropertiesSource.description: The source content for deployment to the slot.

kind.description: The source content kind for deployment to the slot.

value.description: The instance id of the source kind.

properties.description: The resource-specific properties for this resource.

ExtensionVersionListResult.description: The response of a ExtensionVersion list operation.

value.description: The ExtensionVersion items on this page

nextLink.description: The link to the next page of items

ExtensionVersionProperties.description: The properties of an extension version.

buildOutputArtifactUri.description: The path to the ingested extension build artifact zip for the version.

hasBeenDeployed.description: Indicates if the version has ever been deployed

ignoreDuplicateZipError.description: Indicates if duplicate zip error should be ignored.

source.description: The build output artifact zip to create a version from

version.description: The extension page version of the zip

ExtensionVersionPropertiesSource.description: The build output artifact zip to create a version from

kind.description: The kind of source content for the version. If omitted uses latest exported version from extension.

value.description: The instance id of the source kind.

values.name: BuildArtifactZipUri
values.description: The build artifact zip uri of the extension version.

PatchableExtensionDeployment.description: The patchable fields of extension deployment.

PatchableExtensionSlot.description: The patchable fields of extension slot.

PatchableExtensionVersion.description: The patchable fields of extension version.

PatchableExtensionVersionProperties.description: Patchable properties of an extension version.

hasBeenDeployed.description: Set by RP to indicate if the version has ever been deployed

properties.description: The resource-specific properties for this resource.

alterations.description: The list of alterations to perform on the source code.

PortalExtensionAlterAlterationsItem.description: The alterations item to perform on the source code.

base64Content.description: The base 64 encoded content of the file.

PortalExtensionCompileFile.description: The contents of the file to compile.

stringSource.description: The contents of the string source.

PortalExtensionCompileFileResult.description: The result of contents of the file to compile.

kind.description: The kind of the source package.

PortalExtensionExportResult.description: The result of the export extension request

kind.description: The kind of the source package.

uri.description: The uri of the source package.

PortalExtensionListResult.description: The response of a PortalExtension list operation.

value.description: The PortalExtension items on this page

nextLink.description: The link to the next page of items

PortalExtensionListSourcesAssetTypeFile.description: The extension list source asset type file.

name.description: The name of the asset type.

PortalExtensionListSourcesFile.description: The content metadata of a file

lastModifiedAt.description: The last time stamp the file was modified.

PortalExtensionListSourcesFolder.description: The content metadata of a folder

PortalExtensionListSourcesOtherFile.description: The extension list source other file.

PortalExtensionListSourcesResult.description: The list of sources in the extension

PortalExtensionListSourcesViewFile.description: The extension list source view file.

source.description: The new source code of the extension.

icm.description: Readonly. The ICM routing details for any live site issues for the extension set in service tree

feedbackEmail.description: Readonly. Email for customer feedback from service tree.

oAuthClientId.description: Readonly. The oAuthClientId guid from service tree.

previewStamp.description: Readonly. The preview stamp from service tree.

portalName.description: Readonly. The Azure portal extension name e.g Microsoft_Azure_Storage. Comes in from extension.pdl or extension.dx.json or is generated.

apiDefinition.description: The ARM API definition used to generate extension content.

provisioningState.description: The current registration or provisioning state which only appears in the response

publicStatus.description: The visibility of the extension. By default status will be NotOnboarded. Microsoft owned extensions can promote using service tree. External extensions can promote your application use partner center.

runtimeUri.description: Once provisioningState is in the terminal state of Succeeded this is the portal runtime uri for portal extensions with status of private

PortalExtensionPropertiesIcm.description: Readonly. The ICM routing details for any live site issues for the extension set in service tree

service.description: Readonly. The ICM service route e.g Azure Portal (IbizaFx) from ICM for the service tree icm teamId.

team.description: Readonly. The team under the ICM service e.g Portal from ICM for the service tree icm teamId.

teamId.description: Readonly. The ICM team Id from service tree.

PortalExtensionPropertiesSource.description: The new source code of the extension.

kind.description: The kind of the source package.

uri.description: The uri of the source package.

values.name: SourceCodeZipUri
values.description: The source code zip uri of the extension.

PortalTenantCompileFileProperties.description: The contents of the file to compile.

stringSource.description: The contents of the string source.

files.description: The contents of referenced files. The property name is the relative file path and the value is its contents.

provisioningState.description: The current registration or provisioning state which only appears in the response.

PortalTenantCompileFileResult.description: The contents of the file to compile.

values.name: PrivatePreview
values.description: The extension is in private preview.

values.name: PublicPreview
values.description: The extension is in public preview.
